title: Giving Up The Ghost
description: Gerry is a man who uses alcohol, drugs and women to fill the gaping hole where his soul should be. His elderly parents, Bill and Margo, are tired of his lack of responsibility and fear for his future, and the future of those around him. The decide the only way to help him...is to haunt him.From the author of "Demons and Other Inconveniences", "How to Eat a Human Being" and "Lunacy".
author: Dan Dillard
